The '''Tulaytullah Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]], themed after the ancient civilization of [[Tulaytullah]].

All weapons in this series share the same Base ATK range of '''42-510''', and the same Secondary Stat: '''Elemental Mastery''' range of '''36-165'''

==Weapons==
{{Weapons by Category Table|type=Tulaytullah Series}}

==Lore==
The lore of the series is about the times of Tullaytulah. Its central characters are [[Faramarz|Prince Faramarz]], [[Makhaira]], [[Xiphos]], and the [[Old Blind Poet|old blind poet]] who was Xiphos' master.
